headline: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) Reports 14% Sales Growth and New Model Launches
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) saw its stock price move by 12% over the last quarter amidst several significant developments. The company announced a robust 14% increase in vehicle sales for the second quarter of 2025, totaling 612,095 units. Additionally, Ford is enhancing its product lineup with the introduction of the Explorer Tremor and F-150 Lobo trucks, catering to performance and off-road enthusiasts. These advancements coincide with broader market movements, as both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq...
